[Undaunted](/Feats.aspx?ID=4499) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 68 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your spirit has endured many challenges over its long existence. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects. If you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.
